headline: Medtronic: Strength In Cardiac Ablation Solutions, Upgrade To Buy
summary: Medtronic reported 4.1% organic revenue growth and 6.2% adjusted EPS growth. See why we upgraded MDT stock to 'Buy' with a $105 fair value.

headline: 3 Tariff-Proof Medical Device Stocks to Watch Amid Trump's MAGA Slogan
summary: Tariffs are shaking up the Medical Device industry, but SYK, MDT & PODD are poised to thrive. Here's why three key players remain strong despite rising trade tensions.

headline: FDA tags Medtronic embolisation device recall as Class I
summary: Medtronic initiated the recall of certain Pipeline Vantage embolisation devices in January 2025 following reports of four patient deaths.

raw.headline: FDA tags Medtronic embolisation device recall as Class I
raw.summary: Medtronic initiated the recall of certain Pipeline Vantage embolisation devices in January 2025 following reports of four patient deaths.

headline: BlackRock Equity Dividend V.I. Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The fund posted a return of -3.56% (Class I shares) for the fourth quarter of 2024. The largest exposures were in the financials, health care, and industrials sectors.

headline: Medtronic recalls embolization devices tied to 17 injuries, 4 deaths
summary: Medtronic will remove one model of Pipeline Vantage devices from where they’re used and sold and will update the instructions for another model.
